name: CNN
text:
Did President Trump "authorize" the federal government to arrest those who vandalize these statues?

Facts First: Trump's actions have simply directed the attorney general to enforce existing laws. They don't create new laws or possible prison sentences. https://t.co/k8JbjCMw1y
